portfolio.title: Excellence Study
portfolio.description: A full stack based web application to support authentic family to run their homestay by provding accommodation to Students. ReactJS used to create fully responsive, single page front-end.Graph Ql is used to provide embbed notes from hashnode and Next.js is used to API routes handling

portfolio.title: Hello World!
portfolio.description: A full stack web app that emulates core functionality of social media platforms. I implemented features including user login-signup, post creation, like the posts and follow unfollow the other users. along with React Technology, I used Redux for state management, JWT Token for authentication.,

portfolio.title: Fitness Club
portfolio.description: A Full stack based Fitness Club web application empowers users to provide efficiently fitness functionality with ease. With comprehensive CRUD functionality, you can effortlessly create, view, update, and delete tasks, providing a seamless and organized GYM management experience.
